param.name: id
param.label: id
param.description: specifies the id of the HTML element (containing your alternative content) you would like to have replaced by your Flash content

param.name: file
param.label: File Path
param.description: Path to the SWF file.

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: specifies the width of your SWF

param.name: height
param.label: Height
param.description: specifies the height of your SWF

param.name: bgcolor
param.label: Background color
param.description: Background color of SWF in hexadecimal: #ffffff

param.name: version
param.label: Version
param.description: Minimum version for the SWF.

param.name: alt_content
param.label: Alternative content
param.description: HTML to display if flash player is not detected.

param.name: flash_link
param.label: Flash player link
param.description: Enables the button to download the flash player if the swf is not loaded

param.name: wmode
param.label: Window Mode
param.description: Sets the Window Mode property of the Flash movie for transparency, layering, and positioning in the browser.

param.name: allowscriptaccess
param.label: AllowScriptAccess
param.description: The AllowScriptAccess parameter in the HTML code that loads a SWF file controls the ability to perform outbound URL access from within the SWF file. Set this parameter inside the PARAM or EMBED tag. If no value is set for AllowScriptAccess, the SWF file and the HTML page can communicate only if both are from the same domain.
